title: Always crashes
body: My game will never start at all just a black screen and im getting leaver busters cause you guys cant fix your game.. please fix this

replies.body: Black screens usually mean your network can't reach the game server, so it can't download assets or files.  Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot your connection and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
Same thing here, No comment or help from Riot
